analysis.description:
EPTCrowdfund.endCrowdFund (/unique_contracts/0xd73c51ce805c86046577b7b4e5cb2dde14d72a36.sol#411-425) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(founderAddress,remainingtoken) (/unique_contracts/0xd73c51ce805c86046577b7b4e5cb2dde14d72a36.sol#418-419)

Reentrancy in EPTCrowdfund.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xd73c51ce805c86046577b7b4e5cb2dde14d72a36.sol#320-346):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_beneficiary,amount) (/unique_contracts/0xd73c51ce805c86046577b7b4e5cb2dde14d72a36.sol#327-342)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundTransfer(msg.value) (/unique_contracts/0xd73c51ce805c86046577b7b4e5cb2dde14d72a36.sol#333)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ethRaised (/unique_contracts/0xd73c51ce805c86046577b7b4e5cb2dde14d72a36.sol#333-334)
	- tokenSold (/unique_contracts/0xd73c51ce805c86046577b7b4e5cb2dde14d72a36.sol#335-339)

EPTCrowdfund.crowdfundEndTime should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xd73c51ce805c86046577b7b4e5cb2dde14d72a36.sol#219)
EPTCrowdfund.crowdfundStartTime should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xd73c51ce805c86046577b7b4e5cb2dde14d72a36.sol#218)
